[[Image:Cornfield Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Cornfield on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Cornfield''' is a settlement in [[the Westerlands]]. It the seat of [[House Swyft]], a knightly house sworn to [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]]. It is located south-east of Casterly Rock and [[Lannisport]] and north-east of [[Crakehall]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/cornfield/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Cornfield entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Cornfield is the seat of House Swyft.
